availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alexander Campbell Menefee (Rockcastle County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier.)

body.p: Rockcastle County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Paulina Snodgrass Menefee in Rockcastle County, Kentucky, on March 15, 1858. Father of William W. Menefee, Ellen M. Menefee, and Sofia Menefee. Farmer in Rockcastle County, Kentucky, in 1860. Farmer in Rockcastle County in 1860. Served in the Rockcastle and Lincoln County Home Guards (U.S.A.) as a private from May 7, 1862, to July 7, 1862.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, p. 526.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, District 2, p. 38B.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers Who Served in Organizations From the State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 0472.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Rockcastle County, KY, June 1863, p. 244.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994053, Rockcastle County Marriages.
